channel.title: How do I add a members-only area?
channel.description: yeah umm..i wanna add a members-only area, or like, a portal that takes u to a place and u can only go thru it if ur a member/admin/mod or whatever..please help lol

item.title: How do I add a members-only area?
item.dc:creator: @bhpkyeah satesql
item.description:
@bhpkyeah wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("admin") && playerRights >= 3) { if(teleblock == true){ sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); else { teleportToX = xxxx; teleportToY = xxxx; sendMessage("secret admin city!"); }

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add a members-only area?

item.title: How do I add a members-only area?
item.dc:creator: @moparclient moparclient
item.description:
@moparclient wrote:

add this to your command or to your portal :

if(playerIsMember == 0)

portal example :

case 7319: // memberportal if(playerIsMember == 1) teleportToX = 3117; teleportToY = 9842; sendMessage("you teleport to the members area."); if(playerIsMember == 0) sendMessage("you have to be a member to use this portal!"); break;

by moparclient

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add a members-only area?

item.title: How do I add a members-only area?
item.dc:creator: @_Java_Maybe • Java Maybe •
item.description:
@_Java_Maybe wrote:

search for object click one
first click on objects

for members you’ll have to declare

public boolean member = true; //also can use false …

case /*IdNumberOfObject*/: if(member || playerRights > 1) { teleportToX = ****;//x coord to tele teleportToY = ****;//y coord to tele } else { sendMessage("This Area Is For Mods Or Members Only!"); }

Read full topic
